section.heading: Diabetes Articles
section.message: MyNetDiary provides online tools for tracking blood glucose, insulin, and medications, as well as a special Diabetes Tracker mobile app for iPhone and for Android that can sync with the website. The following two articles provide background information on diabetes, and an overview of tracking diabetes with MyNetDiary — how to get the most out of it.

data.name: Diabetes Basics
data.description: Describes the basics of healthy eating and carb goals for people with diabetes. This article is also helpful for people with prediabetes.

data.name: Tracking Diabetes with MyNetDiary
data.description: Overview, tips, and recommendations for tracking diabetes with MyNetDiary.

data.name: Sue Heikkinen
data.para1: Registered Dietitian Nutritionist and Certified Diabetes Care and Education Specialist

data.para1: Registered Dietitian Nutritionist and Certified Diabetes Care and Education Specialist

data.name: Joanna Kriehn
data.para1: Registered Dietitian Nutritionist and Certified Diabetes Care and Education Specialist
data.description: 20+ years of experience in human research, weight management, diabetes education, sports nutrition and wellness.

data.name: Katherine Isacks
data.para1: Registered Dietitian Nutritionist and Certified Diabetes Care and Education Specialist
data.description: 14+ years experience working in weight management, diabetes management, cardiovascular disease, and wellness.
